    Package Description
    org.infogrid.comm
    Communications primitives.

    • Uses of MessageEndpoint in org.infogrid.comm

      Subinterfaces of MessageEndpoint in org.infogrid.comm 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BidirectionalMessageEndpoint<T>
      A message endpoint for bidirectional communications.
      interface  ReceivingMessageEndpoint<T>
      A message endpoint for receiving messages.
      interface  SendingMessageEndpoint<T>
      A message endpoint for sending messages.
      Classes in org.infogrid.comm that implement MessageEndpoint

      class  AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
      Factors out functionality common to many SendingMessageEndpoint implementations that use a "fire and forget" model.
      class  AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
      Factors out functionality common to many SendingMessageEndpoint implementations.
